author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

What is Pragmata? Up until now, we weren't quite sure what to expect from this long-in-development title, but we've played it now on PC - and we like what we see. John and Rich explain what impressed them about the demo, how the gameplay works and what high-end features you can expect on PC (tested on RTX 5090). A bit of an update: we've now played the same content on PS5 Pro at Gamescom 2025 and can confirm 60fps and RT - this is looking very cool.

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00:00 Overview 
00:01:13 Gameplay 
00:05:36 Ray-traced GI and reflections 
00:06:24 Concluding thoughts
title: Pragmata: Capcom's Next Big Thing? Hands-On First Look - Gameplay Impressions, RT + More
